snippet: Mr. Collins created Surfline.com, whose forecasts and real-time views of beaches reach 1.5 million surfers a week.
abstract: Sean Collins, creator of Web site Surfline.com whose forecasts and real-time views of beaches reach 1.5 million surfers weekly, dies at age 59.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Collins created Surfline.com, whose forecasts and real-time views of beaches reach 1.5 million surfers a week.

headline.seo: Sean Collins, Trusted Forecaster for Surfers, Dies at 59
headline.main: Sean Collins, Who Used Science to Help Surfers, Dies at 59
headline.print_headline: Sean Collins, 59, Forecaster; Used Science to Help Surfers
